game.name: Karakurium
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A cozy, Japanese-style puzzle adventure featuring 50 types of gimmicks. Explore a vast world made up of 500 stages! Hints available for most stages, and many challenging puzzles await.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy, Japanese-style puzzle adventure featuring 50 types of gimmicks. Explore a vast world made up of 500 stages! Hints available for most stages, and many challenging puzzles await.
